title: GhJSON Extension: gh.csharp (v1.0)
description: Extension for C# Script component state

showStandardOutput.description: Whether to show standard output parameter (default: true)

avoidMarshalGuids.description: Avoid Marshalling Output Guids - true when enabled (default: false)

avoidGraftOutputs.description: Avoid Grafting Output Lines - true when enabled (default: false)

avoidMarshalInputs.description: Avoid Marshalling Inputs - true when enabled (default: false)

outModifiers.description: Modifiers for the 'out' standard output parameter
